data.name: DateTimeOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The method '{0}' uses '{1}' that may cause non-deterministic behavior when invoked from orchestration '{2}'

data.name: DateTimeOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: System.DateTime calls must be deterministic inside an orchestration

data.name: GuidOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The method '{0}' uses '{1}' that may cause non-deterministic behavior when invoked from orchestration '{2}'

data.name: GuidOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: System.Guid calls must be deterministic inside an orchestration

data.name: DelayOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The method '{0}' uses '{1}' that may cause non-deterministic behavior when invoked from orchestration '{2}'

data.name: DelayOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Thread.Sleep and Task.Delay calls are not allowed inside an orchestrator

data.name: OrchestrationTriggerBindingAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: [OrchestrationTrigger] is associated with the wrong type '{0}', it must be used with TaskOrchestrationContext

data.name: OrchestrationTriggerBindingAnalyzerTitle
data.value: [OrchestrationTrigger] must be used with TaskOrchestrationContext

data.name: EntityTriggerBindingAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: [EntityTrigger] is associated with the wrong type '{0}', it must be used with TaskEntityDispatcher

data.name: EntityTriggerBindingAnalyzerTitle
data.value: [EntityTrigger] must be used with TaskOrchestrationContext

data.name: DurableClientBindingAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: [DurableClient] is associated with the wrong type '{0}', it must be used with DurableTaskClient

data.name: DurableClientBindingAnalyzerTitle
data.value: [DurableClient] must be used with DurableTaskClient

data.name: CancellationTokenOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Orchestration '{0}' is using a CancellationToken binding, which is not supported

data.name: CancellationTokenOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: CancellationToken should not be used as an orchestrator function parameter

data.name: OtherBindingsOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Orchestration '{0}' is using multiple bindings

data.name: OtherBindingsOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: OrchestrationTrigger methods must not use any other bindings

data.name: EnvironmentOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The method '{0}' uses environment variables through '{1}' that may cause non-deterministic behavior when invoked from orchestration '{2}'

data.name: EnvironmentOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Environment variables must not be accessed inside an orchestrator function

data.name: IOOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The method '{0}' performs I/O through '{1}' that may cause non-deterministic behavior when invoked from orchestration '{2}'

data.name: IOOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: I/O operations are not allowed inside an orchestrator function

data.name: ThreadTaskOrchestrationAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: The method '{0}' uses non-deterministic Threads/Tasks operations by the invocation of '{1}' in orchestration '{2}'

data.name: ThreadTaskOrchestrationAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Thread and Task calls must be deterministic inside an orchestrator function

data.name: InputArgumentTypeMismatchAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: CallActivityAsync is passing the incorrect type '{0}' instead of '{1}' to the activity function '{2}'

data.name: InputArgumentTypeMismatchAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Activity function calls use the wrong argument type

data.name: OutputArgumentTypeMismatchAnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: CallActivityAsync is expecting the return type '{0}' and that does not match the return type '{1}' of the activity function '{2}'

data.name: OutputArgumentTypeMismatchAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Activity function call return type doesn't match the function definition return type

data.name: UseInsteadFixerTitle
data.value: Use '{0}' instead of '{1}'
